title: Yosemite National Park
description: In November 2009 my school took a class trip to Yosemite.

photos.description: A giant sequoia tree. It's pretty big.
Half Dome. I think "dome" is generous, but it is definitely rounded.
Half Dome again from somewhere else. Notice the many trees.
A jet trail heading apparently directly into a mountain. Reminds me a bit of an inspirational poster. Lots of space for a quote in the sky.
